name: Curivari - Buenaventura Pralines - Picadores P52
additionalNotes: The Curivari Buena Ventura cigar line was released at the 2012 IPCPR Trade show in Orlando and represents another expansion for this top-quality boutique cigar manufacturer. Now a new extended line has be released in 2015 by Curivari, the Buena Ventura Pralines an all Nicaraguan cigar with an addition of a Mexican San Andres maduro wrapper. The cigar was blended to deliver rich, complex notes with deep earthy flavors, hints of bread and a cocoa sweetness.Â
